name: Forest Dodge (ManInAShedGames)
description:
Forest Dodge, a cute infinite runner game full of forest fresh smells and zingy fruits.
Get your squashing slippers on as you run through the land of Meenabrock, dodging logs whilst squashing the fruit.

🎮How to play? 🎮
Use the one-tap super simple controls, to navigate a dangerous forest labyrinth of Friendly fruits and lying logs.

JUMP - Mouse click/A/D/Spacebar/Left/Right  

Collect Fruit to score points 

  • 🍎 Red Apple - 1
  • 🍇 Grapes - 5
  • 🍋 Lemon- 10
  • 🥖 Tree Log - 50
  • ⭐ Star - Makes you invincible for 10 seconds, DESTROY LOGS!
